Package ie.ucd.clops.runtime.automaton

A package containing classes related to the processing of the regular expression specifying the format of the command line.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Automaton<T> Represents a regular expression (command line format) as a finite-state automaton and enables traversing the automaton with tokens of the regular expression (options).
AutomatonTest Represents format of the command line as an automaton and allows traversing the automaton with options.
Token<T> Representation of a token in the regular expression (command line format).
Tokenizer Transforming format line into a list of tokens.
 

Exception Summary
AutomatonException  
EmptyAlternativeException Using alternative operator without predecessor.
EmptyFormatException Format is empty.
LeftOpenBracketException Left open bracket has not been closed.
OpenPlusException Using question mark operator without predecessor.
OpenQuestionException Using question mark operator without predecessor.
OpenStarException Using question mark operator without predecessor.
RightOpenBracketException Right open bracket without corresponding left bracket.
 

Package ie.ucd.clops.runtime.automaton Description

A package containing classes related to the processing of the regular expression specifying the format of the command line. This means tokenizing the expression and an automaton corresponding to the expression.
